Docs.summary: A MIME parser which can be used to parse s and s from arbitrary streams.

MemberSignature.Value: public MimeParser (System.IO.Stream stream, bool persistent);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.IO.Stream stream, bool persistent) cil managed

Docs.param: true if the stream is persistent; otherwise false.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.para: If is true and is seekable, then the will not copy the content of s into memory. Instead, it will use a to reference a substream of . This has the potential to not only save mmeory usage, but also improve performance.
It should be noted, however, that disposing will make it impossible for to read the content.

Docs.summary: Enumerates the messages in the stream.
Docs.remarks: This is mostly useful when parsing mbox-formatted streams.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool IsEndOfStream { get; }

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the parser has reached the end of the input stream.
Docs.value: true if this parser has reached the end of the input stream; otherwise, false.
